name: Churchill
tagline: I build fast,scalable, delightful web applications that users love.
bio: I’m Churchill Daniel, a full-stack developer and problem solver passionate about crafting scalable, user-focused digital products that blend solid engineering with thoughtful design. I love transforming ideas into reliable software — from backend systems to polished interfaces — that deliver measurable impact. Over the years, I’ve built a diverse portfolio of production-ready projects spanning web applications, SaaS tools, and AI-driven platforms. My work focuses on clean architecture, performance optimization, and developer experience, ensuring every product I build is maintainable, efficient, and future-proof.
